item.title: New module: system/tdu version 1.36
item.description: tdu estimates the disk space occupied by all files in a given path.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: physics/py-cuquantum-python version 22.3.0_py39
item.description: NVIDIA cuQuantum Python provides Python bindings and high-level object-oriented models for accessing the full functionalities of NVIDIA cuQuantum SDK from Python.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: physics/cuquantum version 22.03.0.40
item.description: NVIDIA cuQuantum is an SDK of optimized libraries and tools for accelerating quantum computing workflows.

item.title: New module: math/py-optuna version 2.10.0_py39
item.description: Optuna is an automatic hyperparameter optimization software framework, particularly designed for machine learning.

item.description: CuPy is an implementation of NumPy-compatible multi-dimensional array on CUDA.

item.title: New version: math/cutensor version 1.5.0.3

item.title: New version: devel/nccl version 2.11.4
item.description: NCCL (pronounced 'Nickel') is a stand-alone library of standard collective communication routines, such as all-gather, reduce, broadcast, etc., that have been optimized to achieve high bandwidth over PCIe.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/py-tensorflow version default
item.description: TensorFlow™ is an open source software library for numerical computation using data flow graphs.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/py-cython version 0.29.28_py39
item.description: Cython is an optimising static compiler for both the Python programming language and the extended Cython programming language (based on Pyrex).
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/openssl version 3.0.2
item.description: OpenSSL is a full-featured toolkit for general-purpose cryptography and secure communication.

item.title: New version: devel/julia version 1.7.2
item.description: Julia is a high-level, high-performance dynamic programming language for numerical computing.

item.description: The NCO toolkit manipulates and analyzes data stored in netCDF-accessible formats.

item.title: New module: devel/antlr version 2.7.7
item.description: ANTLR (ANother Tool for Language Recognition) is a powerful parser generator for reading, processing, executing, or translating structured text or binary files.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: chemistry/ocean version 2.9.7
item.description: OCEAN is a versatile and user-friendly package for calculating core edge spectroscopy including excitonic effects.

item.description: Apache Spark™ is a unified analytics engine for large-scale data processing.

item.description: The Apache Hadoop software library is a framework that allows for the distributed processing of large data sets across clusters of computers using simple programming models.

item.title: New module: math/tetgen version 1.6.0
item.description: TetGen provides various features to generate good quality and adaptive tetrahedral meshes suitable for numerical methods, such as finite element or finite volume methods.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: physics/py-namaster version 1.2.2_py36
item.description: NaMaster is a C library, Python module and standalone program to compute full-sky angular cross-power spectra of masked fields with arbitrary spin and an arbitrary number of known contaminants using a pseudo-Cl (aka MASTER) approach.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/ffmpeg version 5.0
item.description: FFmpeg is the leading multimedia framework, able to decode, encode, transcode, mux, demux, stream, filter and play pretty much anything that humans and machines have created.
